extendedInfo.description: Our application is a great chance to learn the basis of the foreign language fast and effectively. Unique study method. No more grinding repetitive words translation that will slip your mind soon. You're supposed to figure out the meaning like children learn to speak. They link what they hear with what they see and learn the meaning of each word or phrase comparing the differences between actions or things. Nail down the knowledge that you grasp with the help of writing tasks. The full version offers: - 30 lessons with increasing difficulty levels - 1800 words and phrases voiced by male and female native narrators - over 1500 colorful images There is a free version to try before you buy. It contains 3 lessons: from the beginning, middle and the end of the course. They are given to show the method and the course level that we offer About 5 million people all over the world have already chosen our application as a fair companion. Give it a try too! **Check out FAQ if you encounter any issues: http://learnlikekids.com/taxonomy/term/4 **

reviews.title: Wonderful. Just like Rosetta stone
reviews.comment: I tried this trial with 3 lessons and then upgraded to the full version for just a few dollars. I have learned a lot. Highly recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Quizz part is excellent, but cannot use written part. Would be nice if virtual keyboard was included for systems that don\342\200\231t support hebrew fonts!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t even start
reviews.comment: It tells me that I need to download a file when I open it for the first time. When I try to do so, it says the program has stopped. I can\'t even get it to start.  S4
reviews.author: Michael Blackshire

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Amazing. It\'s fun and holds my attention. I got it to help me revise what I already learnt but I have learnt a lot.  Now I wish I had learned with this from the beginning..
reviews.author: Michaela Kirsteen O\'Neill

reviews.comment: No reviews given!

reviews.title: Sample lessons
reviews.comment: This appears to only be three sample lessons. This should be made clear before download.  Learning to say giraffe in the first lesson? Highly useful to someone but not me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for babysitting
reviews.comment: Perfect for babysitting: To settle them down for nap time, they Loved it & snuggled right up in their blankies (1-2\302\275 yrs old & they were all saying words perfect, & baby (almost 6month old) watching & listening intently (every time baby could get turn always hit the right picture 1st try), first word might not be English& freak parents out lol).
reviews.author: A Google User
